qrList.label: userprocess
qrList.message:
/setvar key=userinput {{input}} |
/if left=userinput right=1 rule=eq "/run blanche.addcommand" |
/if left=userinput right=2 rule=eq "/run blanche.addcommand" |
/if left=userinput right=3 rule=eq "/run blanche.addcommand" |
/flushvar nadanada

qrList.label: aiprocess
qrList.message:
/if left={{lastMessageId}} right=0 rule=eq "/abort" |

/pass ... |
/if left={{lastMessage}} rule=eq right={{pipe}} "/abort" |

/setvar key=traitsready true

qrList.label: Send
qrList.message:
/run blanche.userprocess |
/if left=blocktrigger right=true rule=eq else="/send {{getvar::userinput}}{{newline}}{{pipe}} \| /trigger" "/setvar key=blocktrigger false" | /flushvar nadanada | /setinput

qrList.label: addcommand
qrList.message:
/setvar key=blocktrigger true |

/if left=traitsready right=false rule=eq "/echo Not yet \| /abort" |
/setvar key=endregex (\n\d\s?[:\-\.]\s\|\n(?<=\d\s?[:\-\.][\S\s]+)```) |
/setvar key=tomsgprocess {{lastMessage}} |

/setvar key=startregex (?<=```[\S\s]+)1\s?[:\-\.]\s |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=newdesc1 |
/setvar key=varname newdesc1 |
/run creamsan.isvardefined |
/if left={{pipe}} right=false rule=eq "/echo severity=error Possible traits choices invalid. \| /abort" |

/setvar key=startregex (?<=```[\S\s]+)2\s?[:\-\.]\s |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=newdesc2 |
/setvar key=varname newdesc2 |
/run creamsan.isvardefined |
/if left={{pipe}} right=false rule=eq "/echo severity=error Possible traits choices invalid. \| /abort" |

/setvar key=startregex (?<=```[\S\s]+)3\s?[:\-\.]\s |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=newdesc3 |
/setvar key=varname newdesc3 |
/run creamsan.isvardefined |
/if left={{pipe}} right=false rule=eq "/echo severity=error Possible traits choices invalid. \| /abort" |

/if left=userinput right=1 rule=eq "/setvar key=newdesc \{\{getvar::newdesc1\}\}" |
/if left=userinput right=2 rule=eq "/setvar key=newdesc \{\{getvar::newdesc2\}\}" |
/if left=userinput right=3 rule=eq "/setvar key=newdesc \{\{getvar::newdesc3\}\}" |

/findentry file=Blanche field=key Blanche |
/setvar key=uid |
/getentryfield file=Blanche field=content {{getvar::uid}} |
/setvar key=desc |
/addvar key=desc , {{getvar::newdesc}} |
/setentryfield file=Blanche uid={{getvar::uid}} field=content | /echo Added: {{getvar::newdesc}} |
/flushvar newdesc | /flushvar newdesc1 | /flushvar newdesc2 | /flushvar newdesc3 |
/setvar key=traitsready false
